data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=iHJ-JHTVZL8Q7kNvgHCfK5V&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDIcjDqTCDSmLrpImnsy4GRbeXYV1YpV6Ewmh5xllo2LQ&oe=6674131C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=_gHB0yHucrgQ7kNvgFDXQ9g&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDmLQKulN6wWz2AmC6lRHyQJ1-mHAjBVXTIvz9Wf1_QWQ&oe=66741CA4)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=eCAqdBWEpiIQ7kNvgFeGh11&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAsMMoX5h3zH7dnzV1yHukDuWPkK2pui5fDReUaf_o0CA&oe=66740407)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=xllDznJxsNIQ7kNvgHDUyzk&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCCJ80h80kvVjxe1XditbmADjjF5ddX3y-JGf2C86udeQ&oe=6673F6E6)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=VpZszmd4lHoQ7kNvgFvaGuO&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBtVMugRnCSgZt8vgAEHg2POABPqO4OOBEKAUt7H94t1w&oe=66742358)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=HyngYz3WMB8Q7kNvgE_KShr&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB5RYDsR9UkS0wx5opxEIz1aYt_pfpAhR6EJYllaaR1hA&oe=66741FD9)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=s-kuTGJJECYQ7kNvgEIHW5Q&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYARQITXOiv47XxT4PEOM2M16HGiZErnUYjF9s-2240Kbw&oe=667405F0)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=GibQS3G5W08Q7kNvgFfSjiR&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBLxzn5_4p6R6ExUaz7PSFE6PKTzW4sb23eTFWMvaO9KA&oe=6673F06A)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=4MPU_blFyGYQ7kNvgGOfGt4&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAx_thrOnFMjX8tbO9vnnHP69cis34PiYlOrEyIjnKhBg&oe=66740417)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=-BT-rneu6uEQ7kNvgEKnClQ&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDARF38g_15z0PZ5Z0RYNOLgKJ6v2nQYtmWlAFMjZJLwQ&oe=66741F8C)
